strategy:
Entropy-annealing PPO: keep all current PPO hyper-parameters but add an explicit entropy-bonus schedule to promote early exploration and then let the policy concentrate.  
• Start with entropy coefficient 0.02 for the first 30 % of timesteps, then linearly decay it to 0.0 by 70 % of total training steps, and keep it at 0 afterwards.  
Everything else (network size, learning-rate schedule, GAE-λ, clip-range, etc.) stays identical to the baseline run.  
Rationale: MountainCarContinuous rewards only when the car reaches the flag; extra early stochasticity often helps the agent discover the long push needed to climb the hill. Gradually removing the bonus prevents the final policy from remaining too random once good behaviour is found.
